info.+content: 遊戯王アーク・ファイブ

Yūya Sakaki is a 14-old year student who wants to become a professional entertainment duelist to give everyone a smile, but one day, he ends up fighting an exhibition match against the current champion of the Pro Duel World. This fight will lead him to make a decision, and confront the difficulties to make his dream come true.
"Can You Feel the Power" by ??? [English Version]
#4: "Kirifuda" (切り札; Trump Card) by cinema staff (eps 76-98)
#5: "Kibō no Hikari" (キボウノヒカリ; Light of Hope) by Unknown Number!!! (eps 99-)
#2: "Future fighter!" by Kensho Ono and Yoshimasa Hosoya (eps 31-49)
#3: "ARC of Smile!" by BOYS AND MEN (eps 50-75)
テレビ東京・あにてれ 遊☆戯☆王ＡＲＣ-Ｖ
